title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland (Part 7)
description: Alice is reintroduced to the Duchess, who seems unnecessarily obsessed with morals that make no sense. Alice then meets an extremely rude Gryphon who leads her to a mournful Mock Turtle sitting on a cliff overlooking the sea. The Mock Turtle regales her with a sad tale about the days when he was a real turtle.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
reviewWords: Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand the story
comprehension: Similes and Metaphors                : Identify and understand similes and metaphors
